text0: This is a sample text that is not used in the typing effect, but it is here to show you that you can add more text to the JSON file and it will be displayed in the typing effect.
text1: The AI typing effect is a fun way to display text dynamically. It simulates the experience of typing, which can be engaging for users.

text3: Here's a lengthy paragraph. You can speed up its loading by scrolling left using the horizontal slider below. The typing effect, adjustable to suit user preferences, adds a layer of versatility to digital interactions. While an AI can generate a full response in seconds, it often presents answers gradually, mimicking the rhythm of human conversation. This design choice isn't about technical limitations, it's about enhancing engagement and making the experience feel more natural, as if you're chatting with a real person. In the past, communication relied on letters and emails—static messages read all at once. Today, conversations have evolved into dynamic exchanges, with paragraphs broken into sentences and sentences into short phrases, reflecting the spontaneity of real-life dialogue. This shift mirrors how people interact in messaging apps, where responses unfold in real time, creating a sense of presence and immediacy. The typing effect taps into that cultural shift, offering a familiar cadence that feels conversational rather than mechanical. Still, while some users enjoy the suspense and realism of the typing animation, some prefer instant delivery for efficiency. The beauty of customizable features lies in their ability to cater to both styles—whether you favor the immersive feel of a simulated chat or the practicality of rapid response. So, what's your preference? Do you enjoy watching a message unfold like a live conversation, or would you rather receive the full reply instantly?
text4: Bootstrap icons are used in this project to enhance the user interface. The icons are simple and effective, providing a clean look while maintaining functionality. The theme switch button is similar to the one used in the Bootstrap website, allowing users to toggle between light and dark modes easily. The default theme is set to match the user's browser preference, ensuring a consistent experience across different devices.
text5: It looks like I'm an AI talking to you, but I'm not. I'm just a pre-defined sentence that is being displayed with a typing effect.
text6: Thanks for visiting this GitHub Page. The GitHub icon that appears when you tap the hamburger menu navigates you to the repository page. This project is a personal endeavor by tlam-dev to create an engaging user interface with a typing effect that mimics AI interactions.
